findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose the parties to significant liability without recourse.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to total fees paid may not adequately protect against significant damages.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights may limit oversight and verification of compliance with the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Each party bearing its own attorneys' fees may discourage enforcement of rights due to potential costs.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall bear its own attorneys' fees.
